text:
An aged pedestrian was fatally knocked down by a car whose driver also died after the vehicle hit a road-side ditch on the Tiruchi – Chennai national highway at Konalai, a few kilometres from Tiruchi. The victims were identified as B. Adaikala Mary (65) of Ariyalur and the car driver Rajasekar (55).

Sources said the woman was crossing the highway when the car that was proceeding towards Tiruchi fatally knocked her down.

The vehicle apparently lost control and hit a road-side ditch in which the car driver died on the spot. Two occupants of the car who sustained injuries were admitted to a private hospital here.

The Siruganur police have registered a case.
title: Two killed in road accident
